00017 ObjectRemoveDialog::ObjectRemoveDialog(QWidget *parent, Qt::WindowFlags f):
00018 QDialog(parent, f),
00019 okButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/ok.png"), tr("Ok"), this),
00020 cancelButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/cancel.png"), tr("Cancel"), this),
00021 selectionBox_(tr("Select/deselect all"), this),
00022 view_(this),
00023 filter_(this),
00024 model_(this) {
00025 
00026         setWindowTitle(tr("Select items to be removed"));
00027 
00028         filter_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00029         view_.setModel(&filter_);
00030 
00031         selectionBox_.setChecked(true);
00032 
00033         // set view to be sortable
00034         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00035         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00036         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00037         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00038         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00039         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00040         //view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00041         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00042         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Interactive);
00043         view_.setColumnWidth(0, 500);
00044 
00045         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00046         buttonLayout->addWidget(&selectionBox_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00047         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00048         buttonLayout->addWidget(&okButton_, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00049         buttonLayout->addWidget(&cancelButton_, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00050 
00051         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00052         layout->addWidget(&view_, 1);
00053         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout, 0);
00054 
00055         connect(&cancelButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00056                 this, SLOT(reject()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00057         connect(&okButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00058                 this, SLOT(accept()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00059         connect(&selectionBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00060                 &model_, SLOT(onSelectionChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00061 
00062 }
